author: Agence France-Presse
title: Russia Says New Nuclear Doctrine Is "Warning' To West"
text:
Source: NDTV News | Title: Russia Says New Nuclear Doctrine Is \”Warning\’ To West\”
Putin on Wednesday announced plans to broaden Russia’s rules on the use of its nuclear weaponry.
Moscow: The Kremlin said Thursday that an updated nuclear doctrine that will allow Moscow to use nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states should be seen as a warning to the West.
Russian President Vladimir Putin on Wednesday announced plans to broaden Russia’s rules on the use of its nuclear weaponry, allowing it to unleash a nuclear response in the event of a “massive” air attack.
The proposals would also permit Moscow to respond with nuclear weapons against non-nuclear states if they are supported by nuclear powers — a clear reference to Ukraine and its Western backers.
Kremlin spokesman Dmitry Peskov said the planned changes “must be considered a specific signal”.
“A signal that warns these countries of the consequences if they participate in an attack on our country by various means, not necessarily nuclear,” Peskov told reporters.
Without mentioning Ukraine by name, Peskov said Russia’s “nuclear deterrence is being adjusted on account of elements of tension that are developing along the perimeter of our borders”.
He also said there was “no question” of Russia boosting its nuclear arsenal.
Moscow residents on Thursday told AFP they were worried by the announcement.
“Using the threat of nuclear weapons is always bad. We don’t need another Cuban missile crisis,” said Dimitri, a 21-year-old student who declined to give his surname.
Vadim, a 43-year-old artist who also only gave his first name, said: “An escalation is underway, of course, it is alarming.”
For others, like 60-year-old pensioner Vladimir, the new doctrine could be beneficial and “bring pretentious Europeans to reason”.
The move “can reinforce security and force people in Ukraine and the United States to think”, said Igor Diakov, also a retiree in Moscow.
“Europe will tremble because all the red lines have been crossed and they think they cannot be punished for it. But we won’t let them get away with it.”
Tatiana Nikiforova, a 49-year-old Russian teacher, deferred to her country’s leadership.
“We must have faith in our leaders, there is no other way,” she said.
The proposed changes to Russia’s nuclear doctrine, which Putin himself has the power to approve, come as Ukraine is seeking permission from Western allies to use long-range precision weaponry to strike targets deep inside Russia — so far to no avail.
Kyiv says it is necessary to target Russia’s airfields and military infrastructure that it uses to launch attacks on Ukraine, though the White House is cautious about enabling further escalation.
The West has accused Putin of irresponsible nuclear sabre-rattling throughout the Ukraine conflict, with the Kremlin leader having issued multiple apparent threats about Moscow’s willingness to deploy its nuclear weapons.
(Except for the headline, this story has not been edited by NDTV staff and is published from a syndicated feed.)
Follow us: Read More | Source: NDTV News

title: Wynn Resorts Options Trading: A Deep Dive into Market Sentiment - Wynn Resorts (NASDAQ:WYNN) - Benzinga
text:
Loading... Loading... Whales with a lot of money to spend have taken a noticeably bullish stance on Wynn Resorts .
Looking at options history for Wynn Resorts WYNN we detected 10 trades.
If we consider the specifics of each trade, it is accurate to state that 50% of the investors opened trades with bullish expectations and 50% with bearish.
From the overall spotted trades, 2 are puts, for a total amount of $86,671 and 8, calls, for a total amount of $981,529.
Predicted Price Range Analyzing the Volume and Open Interest in these contracts, it seems that the big players have been eyeing a price window from $80.0 to $105.0 for Wynn Resorts during the past quarter.
Volume & Open Interest Development Assessing the volume and open interest is a strategic step in options trading. These metrics shed light on the liquidity and investor interest in Wynn Resorts's options at specified strike prices. The forthcoming data visualizes the fluctuation in volume and open interest for both calls and puts, linked to Wynn Resorts's substantial trades, within a strike price spectrum from $80.0 to $105.0 over the preceding 30 days.

Date Strike Price Total Trade Price Open Interest Volume WYNN CALL SWEEP BULLISH 06/21/24 $90.00 $670.0K 344 500 WYNN CALL TRADE BULLISH 01/19/24 $80.00 $83.5K 2.0K 51 WYNN CALL TRADE BULLISH 02/16/24 $85.00 $64.0K 117 60 WYNN PUT SWEEP BEARISH 01/12/24 $99.00 $46.9K 0 305 WYNN CALL SWEEP BEARISH 01/19/24 $100.00 $45.9K 7.9K 856 About Wynn Resorts Wynn Resorts operates luxury casinos and resorts. The company was founded in 2002 by Steve Wynn, the former CEO. The company operates four megaresorts: Wynn Macau and Encore in Macao and Wynn Las Vegas and Encore in Las Vegas. Cotai Palace opened in August 2016 in Macao, and Encore Boston Harbor in Massachusetts opened June 2019. We expect the company to open a new building next to its existing Wynn Palace resort in around 2028. The company also operates Wynn Interactive, a digital sports betting and iGaming platform. The company received 76% and 24% of its 2019 prepandemic EBITDA from Macao and Las Vegas, respectively.
Following our analysis of the options activities associated with Wynn Resorts, we pivot to a closer look at the company's own performance.

author: El Cronista
title: VOLVER AL TRABAJO: el GOBIERNO pautó la FECHA DE ELIMINACIÓN del PROGRAMA - El Cronista
text: El Ministerio de Capital Humano oficializó este viernes nuevas modificaciones al programa Volver al Trabajo (VAT).La iniciativa lanzada en abril de 2024 y con impacto en 961.184 titulares se encontrará desde septiembre bajo la órbita de la Subsecretaría de Empleo y Formación que regirá como autoridad de aplicación. El área podrá dictar los actos administrativos reglamentarios y complementarios que resulten pertinentes, al tiempo que suscribir los convenios necesarios para cumplimentar con los objetivos generales.Luis Alberto Palomino estará a cargo de la unidad de control de Volver al TrabajoAdemás, mediate el artículo 3° de la Resolución 638/2024 publicada en la edición del Boletín Oficial (BORA), se efectivizó la creación de la Unidad Ejecutora Especial Temporaria. Estará a cargo del ahora exconcejal por La Libertad Avanza (LLA) en Vicente López, Luis Alberto Palomino y con un plazo de vigencia temporal de tan sólo dos años."La Unidad Ejecutora Especial Temporaria mantendrá su vigencia hasta tanto se culmine con las tareas y gestiones necesarias para la finalización de las actuaciones y procedimientos administrativos en trámite vinculados con la implementación del Programa Nacional de Inclusión Socio-Productiva y Desarrollo Local Potenciar Trabajo", reseñó el artículo 8° de la normativa firmada por la titular de la cartera nacional Sandra Pettovello.ExPotenciar Trabajo Volver al Trabajo con aumento: el Gobierno definió cómo seguirán los montos del programa de Capital Humano ¿Cómo continuará el programa Volver al Trabajo?Luego de activar el período de revalidación de datos personales en abril mediante la plataforma Portal Empleo, el Ministerio de Capital Humano lanzó las inscripciones para acceder a los cursos de formación laboral."Si sos beneficiario del programa Volver al Trabajo o del programa Fomentar, podés acceder a una oferta formativa amplia y gratuita. Las propuestas se desarrollan a lo largo de todo el país en formato presencial o virtual", detalló el sitio oficial en el apartado descriptivo.Capital Humano habilitó nuevos cursos para beneficiarios de Volver al TrabajoCon ofertas ya renovadas para su inicio en septiembre y octubre, las convocatorias presenciales se subdividen en Administración, Metalurgia, Gastronomía, Construcción, Cuidados, Automotriz, Hogar, Conducción de equipos móviles, Textil, Rural, entre otros.Respeto a las chances de anunciar un nuevo incremento del haber que, desde diciembre de 2023 se mantiene en $ 78.000, el jefe de Gabinete, Guillermo Francos, descartó evaluación alguna."No hay prevista ninguna actualización de los montos para el VAT para incentivar su absorción por el sector privado. La política está focalizada a desarrollar, a partir de la finalización del VAT, nuevos esquemas de mejora de la empleabilidad", repasó el funcionario en el Informe de Gestión N° 140 que presentó ante la Cámara de Diputados. Resolución 638/2024 by Edu Lalo Mejias
